00016 #include "NetworkStackTrafficGen.h"
00017 
00018 #include <cassert>
00019 
00020 #include "Packet.h"
00021 #include "BaseMacLayer.h"
00022 #include "FindModule.h"
00023 #include "NetwToMacControlInfo.h"
00024 
00025 Define_Module(NetworkStackTrafficGen);
00026 
00027 void NetworkStackTrafficGen::initialize(int stage)
00028 {
00029   BaseLayer::initialize(stage);
00030 
00031   if(stage == 0) {
00032     world        = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00033     delayTimer   = new cMessage("delay-timer", SEND_BROADCAST_TIMER);
00034 
00035     arp          = FindModule<BaseArp*>::findSubModule(findHost());
00036     myNetwAddr   = arp->myNetwAddr(this);
00037 
00038     packetLength = par("packetLength");
00039     packetTime   = par("packetTime");
00040     pppt         = par("packetsPerPacketTime");
00041     burstSize    = par("burstSize");
00042     destination  = LAddress::L3Type(par("destination").longValue());
00043 
00044     nbPacketDropped = 0;
00045   } else if (stage == 1) {
00046     if(burstSize > 0) {
00047       remainingBurst = burstSize;
00048       scheduleAt(dblrand() * packetTime * burstSize / pppt, delayTimer);
00049     }
00050   } else {
00051 
00052   }
00053 }
00054 
00055 NetworkStackTrafficGen::~NetworkStackTrafficGen() {
00056   cancelAndDelete(delayTimer);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void NetworkStackTrafficGen::finish()
00061 {
00062   recordScalar("dropped", nbPacketDropped);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void NetworkStackTrafficGen::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg)
00066 {
00067   switch( msg->getKind() )
00068   {
00069   case SEND_BROADCAST_TIMER:
00070     assert(msg == delayTimer);
00071 
00072 
00073     sendBroadcast();
00074 
00075     remainingBurst--;
00076 
00077     if(remainingBurst == 0) {
00078       remainingBurst = burstSize;
00079       scheduleAt(simTime() + (dblrand()*1.4+0.3)*packetTime * burstSize / pppt, msg);
00080     } else {
00081       scheduleAt(simTime() + packetTime * 2, msg);
00082     }
00083 
00084     break;
00085   default:
00086     EV << "Unkown selfmessage! -> delete, kind: "<<msg->getKind() <<endl;
00087     delete msg;
00088     break;
00089   }
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 void NetworkStackTrafficGen::handleLowerMsg(cMessage *msg)
00094 {
00095   Packet p(packetLength, 1, 0);
00096   emit(BaseMacLayer::catPacketSignal, &p);
00097 
00098   delete msg;
00099   msg = 0;
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 void NetworkStackTrafficGen::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg)
00104 {
00105   if(msg->getKind() == BaseMacLayer::PACKET_DROPPED) {
00106     nbPacketDropped++;
00107   }
00108   delete msg;
00109   msg = 0;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void NetworkStackTrafficGen::sendBroadcast()
00113 {
00114   NetwPkt *pkt = new NetwPkt("BROADCAST_MESSAGE", BROADCAST_MESSAGE);
00115   pkt->setBitLength(packetLength);
00116 
00117   pkt->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00118   pkt->setDestAddr(destination);
00119 
00120   NetwToMacControlInfo::setControlInfo(pkt, LAddress::L2BROADCAST);
00121 
00122   Packet p(packetLength, 0, 1);
00123   emit(BaseMacLayer::catPacketSignal, &p);
00124 
00125   sendDown(pkt);
00126 }
